info.title: CareerIN
info.description: Multi-Agent AI System for Culture, Brand, and CX Report Generation

post.description:
Register a new user with:
- *full_name: User's full name
- **email: Valid email address (must be unique)
- **education_level: User's education level
- **preferred_career_track: User's preferred career path
- **password: Secure password (will be hashed)
- **skills: Optional list of skills (defaults to empty list)

OAuth2 compatible token login.
Use email as username in the form.

get.description:
Get the current authenticated user's profile.
Returns all user information including skills, education, and career preferences.

put.description:
Update the current user's profile.
Can update:
- **full_name: User's full name
- **education_level: User's education level
- **preferred_career_track: User's preferred career path
- **skills: Complete list of skills (replaces existing)

post.description:
Add a single skill to the current user's profile.
The skill will only be added if it doesn't already exist.

- **skill: The skill name to add (non-empty string, max 100 characters)

delete.description:
Remove a skill from the current user's profile.

- **skill: The skill name to remove

parameters.name: skill

schema.description: The skill to remove from the user's profile
schema.title: Skill

parameters.description: The skill to remove from the user's profile

post.description:
Create a new job listing.

- **title: Job title (required)
- **description: Job description (required)
- **company: Company name (required)
- **job_type: Type of job (INTERNSHIP, PART_TIME, FULL_TIME, FREELANCE)
- **job_location: Location type (REMOTE, HYBRID, ON_SITE) - optional
- **required_skills: List of required skills (at least 1)
- **recommended_experience_level: Experience level (STUDENT, ENTRY, JUNIOR)
- **salary_range_min: Minimum salary - optional
- **salary_range_max: Maximum salary - optional

get.description:
Get a list of jobs with optional filtering.

- **skip: Number of records to skip (for pagination)
- **limit: Maximum number of records to return (default: 100, max: 1000)
- **job_type: Filter by job type (INTERNSHIP, PART_TIME, FULL_TIME, FREELANCE)
- **experience_level: Filter by experience level (STUDENT, ENTRY, JUNIOR)
- **skills: Comma-separated list of skills (e.g., "Python,JavaScript")

parameters.name: limit

schema.description: Maximum number of records to return
schema.title: Limit

parameters.description: Maximum number of records to return

parameters.name: skills

schema.description: Comma-separated list of skills to filter by
schema.title: Skills

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of skills to filter by

get.description:
Get a specific job by ID.

- **job_id: The unique identifier of the job

put.description:
Update an existing job listing.

- **job_id: The unique identifier of the job to update
- All fields are optional - only provided fields will be updated

delete.description:
Delete a job listing.

- **job_id: The unique identifier of the job to delete

post.description:
Create a new learning resource.

- **name: Resource name (required)
- **description: Resource description (required)
- **url: Resource URL (required, must be valid URL)
- **tags: List of tags for categorization (optional)

get.description:
Get a list of learning resources with optional filtering.

- **skip: Number of records to skip (for pagination)
- **limit: Maximum number of records to return (default: 100, max: 1000)
- **tags: Comma-separated list of tags (e.g., "Python,Web Development")

parameters.name: limit

schema.description: Maximum number of records to return
schema.title: Limit

parameters.description: Maximum number of records to return

parameters.name: tags

schema.description: Comma-separated list of tags to filter by
schema.title: Tags

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of tags to filter by

get.description:
Get a specific learning resource by ID.

- **resource_id: The unique identifier of the resource

put.description:
Update an existing learning resource.

- **resource_id: The unique identifier of the resource to update
- All fields are optional - only provided fields will be updated

delete.description:
Delete a learning resource.

- **resource_id*: The unique identifier of the resource to delete
